content: yeah - because the world totally needs another christmas ornament pattern a simple sphere pattern with notes on how to personalise currently only for 7 cm ornaments but i am working on other sizes update i have added a chart for 1/8 off the ball just in case you want to get your crayons out update november 2014 i have uploaded another file with additional charts please read more about the design here http //www ravelry com/projects/braindead/balls-up--2 update december 2020 apparently this pattern is offered for sale online please note that this is not me and not authorised the pattern is and shall remain free and i hope nobody has been duped into paying for it happy holidays
